Flow.description: GTMS-26127 screen flow 3/21 - GTMS - 26938 Changes 5/7 - GTMS-27678 Add a Partner Workflow update 8/21/2025: Make partner program field readonly on the screen
Flow.label: Partner Program Enrollment Flow

fields.name: EnrollmentMessage
fields.fieldText: New partner enrollment is currently not permitted for this partner program.

textTemplates.name: emailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!PartnerProgramEnrollmentDetail.Partner_Account__r.Owner.Manager.FirstName}


Partner Program Enrollment requires your approval!


Partner Program: {!PartnerProgramEnrollmentDetail.Partner_Program__r.Name}

Partner Account: {!PartnerProgramEnrollmentDetail.Partner_Account__r.Name}



Click Here To Approve or Reject
